source_objects.title: Arts & Crafts
source_objects.description: From quilting to cake decorating, crafting inspiration to art instruction, welcome to the ultimate place for courses in arts & crafts.

items.title: Acrylic lesson - Deer family in the Fall forest - Landscape

visible_instructors.name: Ekaterina
visible_instructors.job_title: Watercolor and Acrylic Artist and Art Tutor
visible_instructors.title: Ekaterina Fedorova

items.headline: Step by Step real-time Painting Tutorial! You will paint deer family in the Fall forest with this lesson!
objectives_summary: Discover how you can paint landscape with pretty deer family: how to plan layers for it, what parts to paint and in what order, how to go from the general to the specific
Learn acrylic painting techniques: layering, blending, detailing, dry brush, shaped brushes using
Learn acrylic painting basics: values, color mixing, issue fixing

items.title: Beginning Lampwork Glass Beads 102-DOTS!
items.headline: You Can Do a LOT with a DOT!
objectives_summary: How to apply DOTS to a lampwork glass beads.
How to decorate a base bead with DOTS.
How to make DOT flowers, twisted, textured DOTS, stripes with DOTS.

items.title: Winter Snow Shadows in Watercolour
items.headline: Learn how to bring colour, composition and techniques together to create a watercolour work of art!
objectives_summary: There are so many opportunities to let watercolours sing in snow scenes. This class is a perfect example of this by making varying degrees of shadows in the snow, in posts and a walking bridge. I love to lay down the brush wet-on-wet here and there,  introducing primary transparent colours.  This base will be the beginning to many layers of paint to create “Winter Snow Shadows”!
If you have been frustrated with watercolours in the past or felt like you "don't get it" - don't worry - I've been there too!
Students will be able to use these concepts how to paint this snowy scene, and apply them to future paintings.

items.title: Realistic References for painting with an intuitive 3D tool
items.headline: Increase your artistic output with the perfect planning of your paintings realistic light setups
objectives_summary: become flexible in planning unique paintings with human protagonists
how to set up a light, the perspective, the colors and the subject so that it arouses the interest of the viewer
learn an intuitive software that allows you to place the lights and objects

items.title: How to Paint like Watercolor in Photoshop
items.headline: Watercolor Painting
objectives_summary: How to paint like watercolor in Photoshop
How to make watercolor brush in Photoshop
Useful Photoshop techniques

items.title: Byzantine Iconography Series 4: Drawing the Full Figure (P4)
items.headline: Laying the Foundations for Byzantine Iconography
objectives_summary: Students will learn to draw frontal full-figure poses
St John the Forerunner
Angels

items.title: Drawing Portraits
items.headline: Sketching A Layout, Features of the Face and a Full Portrait
objectives_summary: The proportions of the face
How to sketch and shade eyes, noses and mouths
How to draw a portrait from start to finish

items.title: Learn Balance in Composition using Flowers
items.headline: Learn about balance in painting which is one of the principles of design and take your art one step ahead!
objectives_summary: Use flowers to make eye catching visuals
Learn the basic use of balance in composition
Learn to make a 'Book of Forms'

items.title: How to Paint: Watercolor Loose Florals for Beginners
items.headline: Start your loose floral journey one brushstroke at a time
objectives_summary: Color theory basics and paint a color wheel
6 watercolor techniques
How to paint leaves in a loose style

items.title: How to Crochet a Seahorse Amigurumi
items.headline: From Knotmonsters: Pink Animals Edition
objectives_summary: How to Crochet a Seahorse Amigurumi
Step by step crochet instructions
Make your own little Seahorse amigurumi

items.title: DIY YUKATA (Japanese Casual Summer KIMONO) making
items.headline: No sewing machine needed. Everything done by hand.
objectives_summary: Finish 1/4 size or your size of Women's YUKATA (Summer Casual Cotton KIMONO)

items.title: Creating Repeat Patterns On iPad Using Assembly App

visible_instructors.title: Mandar Marathe
visible_instructors.name: Mandar
visible_instructors.job_title: Fine Artist, Sculptor, Illustrator, and Engineer

items.headline: Easily create geometric and hand-drawn patterns with just your iPad!
objectives_summary: Learn to use Assembly App to create geometric designs.
Leran to create a repeating pattern of the designs created.
Learn to test the patterns and fine tune them to achieve perfect repeatability.
